--- DateTime: 2021/12/3 20:08
---
---@class  BattleMainManager:MiddleClass
local BattleMainManager = Class("BattleMainManager")

function BattleMainManager:initialize(data)

    self._isBattleStart = false

    -- todo 判断是不是pve战斗
    ---@type PVE_Config_Battle_Manager
    self._battleManager = PVE_Config_Battle_Manager:new(data)

end

function BattleMainManager:beginBattle()
    if  self._battleManager then
        self._battleManager:beginBattle()
    end
    self._isBattleStart = true
end

function BattleMainManager:update(dt,timeScale)
    if not  self._isBattleStart then
        return
    end
    if self._battleManager then
        self._battleManager:update(dt,timeScale)
    end
end

return BattleMainManager
